Scan statistics using patient5 (later renamed patient4) time point 0 vs. all patients time point 70-72 months

```{r setup, results='asis'}
suppressMessages(library(GenomicRanges))
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
suppressMessages(library("tidyverse"))
library(kableExtra)

scan_tables <- readRDS("scan_table.rds")

scan_tables %>%
kable( "latex", booktabs = TRUE, longtable = TRUE, caption = "Scan Statistic") %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("hold_position", "repeat_header"))


```
